moves.1. e4 a6 2. d4: Might as well take the center if he's going to start that way...
moves.5. e5 Nd5 6. Nxd5 Bxd5 7. Bd3 e6 8. O-O: I'm not going to let him attack the flank without me also attacking the flank.
moves.9... bxa4 10. Rxa4 Bc6 11. Rc4 Bb5 12. R: Here is the first sacrifice I do. I do this hoping to trap his Queen.
moves.14... Qxg5 15. Rc8+ Ke7 16. f4 Qg6 17. f: Here, I offer up exf5 Qxd3. This lets his Queen out, but will let me get a vicious attack.
moves.17... Bxf5: Instead, he treats it like I made a mistake. Rather, this was his fatal mistake.
moves.18. Nc6+: A final sacrifice seals in my win.
moves.18... Nxc6 19. Qd6#: I end the game down 10 points materialy, but up a whole king. ;)
